QuestData.Title: Forging a New Future
QuestData.Description:
The forge of the Earth-Warder is the most powerful of all the dragon forges in existence. Our ancestors used it to create the strongest weapons and armor to defend Azeroth.
Within the hearth of that forge is the power necessary to reform the shattered fragments of the Oathstone.
Let us go and prepare the forge for the work to be done.
QuestData.QuestCompletionLog: Deliver the Cindershard Coal to Forgemaster Bazentus.
QuestData.RewardText: Very good. Now with the arrival of our Prince, we can begin.
